posts.content_html:
Hi! I am still developing at my bowling game. But now, I have recently experienced a new issue with the game: It loads like it should, and I it worked like usual until yesterday when I added a new GUI which is going to be a guidebook. By then, when I’ trying to run the game, I’ll be in the game for up to 1 min, then I am suddenly kicked out, and I get this message: “Disconnected. The server has shut down.”.
I have tried to revert to an older version, that did work, but as soon as I revert it back to the newest, it goes back to keep kicking me out. I think it is something with the new guidebook or something. It is maybe due to a new image I imported it doesn’t work.
Anyways, except that, I haven’t tried anything but publish the game as another game.

Here is the image:
Did you use toolbox to do the GUIs? If so, check for the viruses in the GUI’s scripts to make sure they aren’t shutting down your servers
No. I did not use toolbox- GUIs. I made them by myself. The only thing I did was to import a decal from the asset manager.
